help.str: The bot notifies you whenever your favorite Chaturbate models are online. Commands add model ID — Add model remove model ID — Remove model remove_all — Remove all models list — Your subscriptions list help — Command list You can find a model ID in an address line of your browser

denied.str: %s blocked an access from the USA, the location of this bot

syntax_add.str: Enter /add model ID You can find a model ID in an address line of your browser The bot treats lower- and uppercase letters as the same

syntax_remove.str: Enter /remove model ID You can find a model ID in an address line of your browser

already_added.str: Model %s is already in your list

max_models.str: You can add no more than %d models

add_error.str: Could not add the model %s Check the model ID or try later Syntax: /add model ID You can find a model ID in an address line of your browser

model_not_in_list.str: Model %s is not in your list

version.str: Version: 0.1 for MSK and SPB guys

profile_removed.str: Model %s probably has removed her profile

no_models.str: You are not subscribed to any model To subscribe enter /add model ID

remove_all.str:
If you really want to remove all the subscriptions then enter

/sure_remove_all
